name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"ccd095c5-c80c-4348-ba37-1a852ecaa7ce","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: _visit_assign","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7904ea77-395c-41ed-81c5-e13ab31999e5","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"_visit_assign","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function is the powerhouse for analyzing assignment statements (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x = 5","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x.attr = y","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"a[i] = v","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"). While the AST separates "what is assigned" (targets) from "the value assigned" (value), this function unifies them. It determines exactly what data flows where, handling complex scenarios like tuple unpacking and attribute assignment.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"54ae9c82-8de0-426b-9054-0f9db76a2f33","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Why this matters
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Assignment is the primary way state changes in a program. If the analyzer misinterprets ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"user.id = 5","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", it won't know that ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"id","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is an integer. Furthermore, assignments inside ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"if","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" blocks behave differently (creating branched states) than global assignments. This function manages all those nuances.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3cadc41f-9d10-48ab-b57a-31d023bac840","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"How it works","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"46cc6182-f5bf-4230-a328-79d72ed08961","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"RHS Analysis:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" First, it visits and decodes the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Right-Hand Side","styles":{"italic":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"value","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") of the assignment (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"5","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" in ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x = 5","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"). This determines the "source" data.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a7f5076d-22eb-4313-9929-175df8c7cfe7","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Dispatcher:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It iterates through the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Left-Hand Side","styles":{"italic":true}},{"type":"text","text":" targets. It calls the inner helper ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"do_assign","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" for each target.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8ef2c588-44a7-415b-8d46-e9731bf57f22","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Recursion for Unpacking:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" If the assignment is ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"a, b = 1, 2","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"do_assign","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" recursively splits the values and targets, ensuring ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"a","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" gets ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"1","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"b","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" gets ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"2","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ab39b101-8841-4bda-bfd8-435a0c7a9e37","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Target Logic:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"f2a2c563-bd61-47bc-9ff4-96b997fbfee0","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Simple Names (","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"x = ...","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"):","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Calls ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"assign","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". It finds or creates the definition for ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and links it to the value. It is smart about scopes: if inside an ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"if","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" block, it records the change in the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ChangeManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" rather than overwriting the variable globally immediately.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"101ccc78-04fd-46cf-8826-66915a11072f","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Attributes (","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"obj.attr = ...","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"):","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Calls ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"store","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". It resolves ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"obj","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to its definition, finds ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"attr","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" on that object, and updates that specific field.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8e94ea87-478a-4d59-a3a7-cc16425e542f","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Subscripts (","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"lst[0] = ...","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"):","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It handles list/dict modification. It resolves the container (list/map), resolves the key (index), and updates the internal content model of that container.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"f8eecb12-ebb5-45c4-8b18-7e856dde2e2e","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Example Scenario
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Code:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6b0cc34a-16da-4a69-989a-2d33758fdc2a","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"if active:
    user.status = "ONLINE"","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"66714a43-1227-437f-ab42-27837506a9ff","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Analysis:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"fe10991f-812a-4969-ac39-474627c3099c","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"_visit_assign","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" decodes ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":""ONLINE"","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a00e6c5f-b661-40fe-a951-ffe0b515a573","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"do_assign","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" sees ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"user.status","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (Attribute).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3d4f61c8-4bc2-4471-8b37-b01770ffc0b2","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It calls ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"store","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"25e74940-a09e-4c6f-a501-e3b96d1e4fbb","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"store","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" resolves ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"user","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"07172bf2-c3fb-4626-816f-6ff55078554c","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It notes that we are inside an ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"if","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" block (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"active","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"76e7e9a3-bb08-40fd-8a20-c765d350d377","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Instead of permanently changing ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"user.status","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to "ONLINE", it registers a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Change","styles":{"italic":true}},{"type":"text","text":" in the current ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"if","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" scope: "In this branch, ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"user.status","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" becomes 'ONLINE'". This allows ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"mergeIfElse","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" later to say ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"user.status","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"either","styles":{"italic":true}},{"type":"text","text":" its old value ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"or","styles":{"italic":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "ONLINE".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b353c75d-25c2-4a8c-989e-094c137c3c30","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
